item.title: Atlas
item.description: Altas is a general purpose virtual assistant, built with OpenAi's Generative Pre-trained Transformer 3 (GPT-3) and Amazon's Polly neural text to speech engine.

item.title: Sol - A 1kN Hybrid Rocket Engine
item.description: Sol is a 1kN Hybrid rocket engine designed as prerequisition and validaition to the specifications of an upcoming project, Kuiper.

item.title: Iridium - A 3D printed small scale UAV
